subject: Re: Who's the brainiac!?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I added a new folder, Older voices to my main folder. One is an early 
foreign language method voice I got using German, I think it waw back 
in 2002. There there's a couple ET type voices I got early on with one 
of the first boxes. These older voices seem clearer to me, and I don't 
know if it's the boxes, or radio conditions, as it was at the tail end 
of Sun Spot cycle 23. I want to be ready for the next cycle, that could 
start anytime now. 

 Frank-S
